title: Mahou Shoujo Ore (Magical Girl Ore)
synopsis: Saki Uno is an average 15-year-old girl with a side hustle as a member of the exceptionally unpopular idol duo Magical Twins. Despite this, she absolutely loves the time she spends with her best friend Sakuyo Mikage as she strives to become closer with her childhood crush, Sakuyo's brother Mohiro. Her peaceful life, however, unravels when she finds a yakuza-looking thug trying to enter her house. Forced to invite him inside, Saki learns that her mother used to be a demon fighting Magical Girl, and that her brutish guest is actually a mascot named Kokoro-chan looking to recruit a replacement. Dumbfounded and skeptical, Saki is hesitant accept the request until Kokoro-chan reveals that Mohiro is a target of some cute, squirrel-tailed demons.
characters: ['Mikage, Sakuyo', 'Uno, Saki', 'Fujimoto, Ichigou', 'Yamo, Konami', 'Hyoue', 'Mikage, Mohiro', 'Uno, Sayori', 'Kokoro-chan', 'Mahou Shoujo Everything Crazy Beauty', 'Fujimoto, Sangou']
